commentary: Rg6+: double rook sac; both rooks en prise, the only winning move.
…hxg6: grabbing a rook; any capture leads to the same attacking structure.
Qa1!!: quiet retreat, effectively sacrificing the second rook while lining up the long diagonal.
…Kxf7: accepting the second rook; other captures transpose.
Qf6+: queen invades with tempo, driving the king back.
Bh6!: shuts down counterplay and keeps the attack rolling—white is winning.
…Re8: best try to guard g7, but too slow.
Qg7#: mate on the dark-squared diagonal; queen is protected by Bh6.

precomputed_metrics.notes: DeepMind puzzle; 1.Rg6+ is unique winning move; deep engine eval is winning for White.
